CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Silverhaven District Recycling relative to Borealis Township Cleanup?
SRP.A: Silverhaven District Recycling is {above} Borealis Township Cleanup in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Silverhaven District Recycling relative to Stellar Expanse Resource Recovery?
SRP.A: Silverhaven District Recycling is {below} Stellar Expanse Resource Recovery in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Borealis Township Cleanup relative to Silverhaven District Recycling?
SRP.A: Borealis Township Cleanup is {below} Silverhaven District Recycling in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total waste recycled?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Stellar Expanse Resource Recovery}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total waste recycled?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Silverhaven District Recycling}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Borealis Township Cleanup's minimum Waste Recycled in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Borealis Township Cleanup's minimum Waste Recycled is in {1987}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Silverhaven District Recycling's maximum Waste Recycled in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Silverhaven District Recycling's maximum Waste Recycled is in {1986}.

NC.Q: Between 1986 and 1989, did the total Waste Recycled experience a larger or smaller change than between 1987 and 2009?
NC.A: The change in total waste recycled between 1986 and 1989 was {smaller} than between 1987 and 2009.

NC.Q: Was the total Waste Recycled in 1994 higher or lower than in 1996?
NC.A: The total waste recycled in 1994 was {lower} than in 1996.

NC.Q: Between 2005 and 2008, was the average total Waste Recycled higher or lower than between 1995 and 1999?
NC.A: The average total waste recycled between 2005 and 2008 was {higher} than between 1995 and 1999.

NC.Q: Between 1991 and 1996, did the total Waste Recycled experience a larger or smaller change than between 1987 and 1989?
NC.A: The change in total waste recycled between 1991 and 1996 was {larger} than between 1987 and 1989.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Stellar Expanse Resource Recovery} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Stellar Expanse Resource Recovery and Silverhaven District Recycling first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Stellar Expanse Resource Recovery and Silverhaven District Recycling first exchanged leading positions in {1987}.
